name: KUNWiki (K UNiversal Wiki)
short_description: KUNWiki stands for K UNiversal Wiki. It is an extended version of MediaWiki integrated with Web 2.0/3.0 features to provided one stop solution that provides Ease of Use, Community Features & Data aggregation capabilities.
